alert.note: Alert for Rockingham; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 21 at 6:25AM EST until December 22 at 2:49AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Lamprey River Near Newmarket affecting Rockingham and Strafford Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Lamprey River near Newmarket. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Bennett Road in Durham floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 AM EST Thursday the stage was 9.2 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 6.4 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
